title: Myeloma tumor cells: Profiling a killer in warm blood

title_detail.value: Myeloma tumor cells: Profiling a killer in warm blood

summary: Israeli scientists and physicians develop a new technology for profiling the unique genetic makeup of myeloma tumor cells that will allow better diagnosis and treatment.

summary_detail.value: Israeli scientists and physicians develop a new technology for profiling the unique genetic makeup of myeloma tumor cells that will allow better diagnosis and treatment.
